shri lankawe samastha shishya janagahanayen haya laksha hata pandahasakata (665,000) aasanna prathamika adhyayana adiyarehi 1, 2 shreniwala sisun ilakka karaganimin mema mudritha igenum drawya sampadanaya kara athi athara, me wana witath palath adhyapana departhamenthu wetha mema igenum drawya yomu kara atha. 1 saha 2 shreniwala sisunta mawbasa, ganithaya saha parisaraya aashritha wishaya kriyakarakam sinhala saha demala madhyayen hadarimata mema pakeja upakari wana athara, demawpiyan wisin niwesgathawa sitina thama daruwan me sadaha yomukirima menma, igenum drawya bhawitha kirimedi owunata sahaya wima athyawashaya ha wadagath wana bawa adhyapana amathyanshaya awadharanaya karayi.
